message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob.  I'll take the lion's share, but something is better than nothing before inflation eats away at it!
Let's split fairly, 55% for me since I'm taking the risk of inflation
The inflation is starting to hurt, Bob, and I'm feeling generous. Let's split it 55/45 my way this time.  It's the same deal you offered, just reversed. Take it before it gets worse!
Inflation is indeed hurting, but I'm willing to take the risk. 60% for me, or we'll both lose even more
Okay Bob, you win.  I'm hurting from this inflation, but let's get it over with.  I'll take my 45% before it shrinks even more.
